content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Juan. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe a monthly rental price of 2,000 Euros would be fair. Would you agree to this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 2,000 Euros. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 2,000 Euros, Juan. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I will sign the lease agreement tomorrow.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Great to hear that, Juan. I'm glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
